```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment="")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
kc <- read.csv("kc_HouseSales.csv")
```

```{r}
set.seed(7)
kc_1 <- kc[sample(nrow(kc), 20000),]
kc_2 <- kc[sample(nrow(kc), 20000),]
kc_3 <- kc[sample(nrow(kc), 20000),]
kc_4 <- kc[sample(nrow(kc), 20000),]
kc_5 <- kc[sample(nrow(kc), 20000),]
```

```{r}
summary(kc_1)
summary(kc_2)
summary(kc_3)
```
```{r}
write_csv(kc_1, "homeSales_team1.csv")
write_csv(kc_2, "homeSales_team2.csv")
write_csv(kc_3, "homeSales_team3.csv")
write_csv(kc_4, "homeSales_team4.csv")
write_csv(kc_5, "homeSales_team5.csv")
```
